comments.body: Unfortunately there is no UT for the json parser. The test-ability of the json parser is not good...

I think it's more usual to use intercept:

```scala
      val errMsg = intercept[IllegalArgumentException] {
        ...
      }.getMessage
     assert(errMsg.contains("..."))
```
